foreignData.name: Vorbildliche Ojutai

foreignData.name: Elegidos de Ójutai

foreignData.name: Archétypes d'Ojutaï
foreignData.text:

• Exilez les Archétypes d'Ojutaï, puis renvoyez-les sur le champ de bataille, engagés, sous le contrôle de leur propriétaire.

foreignData.name: Esemplari Ojutai

foreignData.name: オジュタイの模範

mainBoard.name: Ojutai Exemplars
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, choose one —
• Tap target creature.
• Ojutai Exemplars gains first strike and lifelink until end of turn.
• Exile Ojutai Exemplars, then return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

rulings.text: After the ability returns Ojutai Exemplars to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the Ojutai Exemplars that left the battlefield. It won't be in combat or have any additional abilities it may have had when it left the battlefield. Any +1/+1 counters on it or Auras attached to it are removed.
If Ojutai Exemplars leaves the battlefield in response to its ability with the third mode chosen, that ability won't return Ojutai Exemplars to the battlefield. It will stay wherever it is.

foreignData.name: Ketten der Obhut
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst
Wenn die Ketten der Obhut ins Spiel kommen, schicke ein Nichtland-Permanent deiner Wahl, das ein Gegner kontrolliert, ins Exil, bis die Ketten der Obhut das Spiel verlassen.
Die verzauberte Kreatur hat Abwehr {2}. (Immer wenn sie das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs oder einer Fähigkeit wird, den bzw. die ein Gegner kontrolliert, neutralisiere ihn bzw. sie, es sei denn, jener Spieler bezahlt {2}.)

foreignData.name: Cadenas de custodia
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura que controlas.
Cuando las Cadenas de custodia entren, exilia el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra que controla un oponente hasta que las Cadenas de custodia dejen el campo de batalla.
La criatura encantada tiene la habilidad de rebatir {2}. (Siempre que sea objetivo de un hechizo o habilidad que controla un oponente, contrarréstalo a menos que ese jugador pague {2}.)

foreignData.name: Chaînes de détention
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : une créature que vous contrôlez
Quand les Chaînes de détention arrivent, exilez un permanent non-terrain ciblé qu'un adversaire contrôle jusqu'à ce que les Chaînes de détention quittent le champ de bataille.
La créature enchantée a parade {2}. (À chaque fois qu'elle devient la cible d'un sort ou d'une capacité qu'un adversaire contrôle, contrecarrez ce sort ou cette capacité à moins que ce joueur ne paie {2}.)

foreignData.name: Catene di Custodia
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura che controlli
Quando le Catene di Custodia entrano, esilia un permanente non terra bersaglio controllato da un avversario finché le Catene di Custodia non lasciano il campo di battaglia.
La creatura incantata ha egida {2}. (Ogniqualvolta diventa bersaglio di una magia o abilità controllata da un avversario, neutralizza quella magia o abilità a meno che quel giocatore non paghi {2}.)

foreignData.name: 拘束の鎖
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー）
拘束の鎖が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールしていて土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とする。拘束の鎖が戦場を離れるまで、それを追放する。
エンチャントしているクリーチャーは護法{2}を持つ。（それが対戦相手がコントロールしている呪文や能力の対象になるたび、そのプレイヤーが{2}を支払わないかぎり、その呪文や能力を打ち消す。）
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

mainBoard.name: Chains of Custody
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature you control
When Chains of Custody enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Chains of Custody leaves the battlefield.
Enchanted creature has ward {2}. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

rulings.text: Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners' graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist. When the card returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the card that was exiled.
If Chains of Custody leaves the battlefield before its second ability resolves, the target permanent won't be exiled.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.

If an Aura is exiled this way, its owner chooses what it will enchant as it returns to the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn't target anything (so it could be attached to a permanent with shroud, for example), but the Aura's enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can't legally be attached to anything, it remains in exile for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text:

When this Aura enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this Aura leaves the battlefield.
Enchanted creature has ward {2}. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

クリーチャー最大２体を対象とする。それらをタップする。
カード１枚を引く。

mainBoard.name: Repel the Darkness
mainBoard.originalText:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: If you target one creature and that target is illegal as Repel the Darkness resolves, the spell doesn't resolve. You don't draw a card.

If you target two creatures and they're both illegal as Repel the Darkness resolves, the spell doesn't resolve; you don't draw a card. If just one target is illegal, the spell does resolve; the remaining legal target becomes tapped (if it's untapped at that time) and you draw a card.
If you target zero creatures, all that happens is you draw a card.
You may target zero, one, or two creatures. The creatures don't need to be untapped.

mainBoard.text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Draw a card.

foreignData.name: Tapfere Haltung
foreignData.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Schaden und Effekte, die „zerstören", zerstören sie nicht.)
• Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Widerstandskraft 4 oder mehr.

foreignData.name: Postura valerosa
foreignData.text:
Elige uno:
• La criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno. (El daño y los efectos que dicen "destruir" no la destruyen.)
• Destruye la criatura objetivo con resistencia de 4 o más.

foreignData.name: Posture valeureuse
foreignData.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• Une créature ciblée acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne la détruisent pas.)
• Détruisez une créature ciblée d'endurance supérieure ou égale à 4.

foreignData.name: Posizione Valorosa
foreignData.text:
Scegli uno —
• Una creatura bersaglio ha indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno. (Il danno e gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non la distruggono.)
• Distruggi una creatura bersaglio con costituzione pari o superiore a 4.

foreignData.name: 勇敢な姿勢
foreignData.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
・クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは破壊不能を得る。（ダメージや「破壊」と書かれた効果では、それは破壊されない。）
・タフネスが４以上であるクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。

mainBoard.name: Valorous Stance

Choose one —
• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

mainBoard.name: Wingsteed Rider
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wingsteed Rider, put a +1/+1 counter on Wingsteed Rider.

rulings.text: Heroic abilities will resolve before the spell that caused them to trigger.
Heroic abilities will trigger only once per spell, even if that spell targets the creature with the heroic ability multiple times.
Heroic abilities won't trigger when a copy of a spell is created on the stack or when a spell's targets are changed to include a creature with a heroic ability.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
